Package imagingbook.lib.math.eigen

Interface RealEigensolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Eigensolver2x2, EigensolverNxN
    public interface RealEigensolver
    Interface for classes performing eigenvalue/eigenvector calculations.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getEigenvalue​(int k)
      Returns the k-th eigenvalue (λ_k, for k = 0,...,N-1).
      double[] getEigenvalues()
      Returns a vector of real eigenvalues in no specific order.
      double[] getEigenvector​(int k)
      Returns the k-th eigenvector (x_k, for k = 0,...,N-1).
      double[][] getEigenvectors()
      Returns a matrix whose columns are the eigenvectors of the solution, arranged in the same order as the eigenvalues returned by getEigenvalues().
      int getSize()
      Returns the size of the system (N = number of rows and columns).
      boolean isReal()
      Returns true iff all eigenvalues of the associated matrix are real.

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Returns the size of the system (N = number of rows and columns).
        Returns:
        size of the system (N)

      • isReal

        boolean isReal()
        Returns true iff all eigenvalues of the associated matrix are real.
        Returns:
        as described

      • getEigenvalues

        double[] getEigenvalues()
        Returns a vector of real eigenvalues in no specific order. NaN is inserted for complex eigenvalues.
        Returns:
        an array of eigenvalues

      • getEigenvalue

        double getEigenvalue​(int k)
        Returns the k-th eigenvalue (λ_k, for k = 0,...,N-1). NaN is returned if the associated eigenvalue is complex-valued (non-real).
        Parameters:
        k - index
        Returns:
        the k-th eigenvalue (λk)

      • getEigenvectors

        double[][] getEigenvectors()
        Returns a matrix whose columns are the eigenvectors of the solution, arranged in the same order as the eigenvalues returned by getEigenvalues().
        Returns:
        a matrix of eigenvectors (column vectors)

      • getEigenvector

        double[] getEigenvector​(int k)
        Returns the k-th eigenvector (x_k, for k = 0,...,N-1). The ordering of the returned eigenvectors is the same as for the eigenvalues returned by getEigenvalues().
        Parameters:
        k - index
        Returns:
        the k-th eigenvector (xk)
